hero.title: Access Your Benefits with
hero.subtitle: Streamlined applications for Medicaid and SNAP benefits. Get the support you need with our secure, easy-to-use platform designed for your success.

features.title: Why Choose Benefit Bridge?
features.subtitle: We've designed our platform to make applying for benefits as simple, secure, and stress-free as possible.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Platform
comprehensive.description: One platform for everything: submit applications, upload documentation, report life changes, respond to notifications, renew benefits, and more.

easy.title: Easy Application
easy.description: Step-by-step guidance through the entire application process with clear, intuitive instructions.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Your personal information is protected with bank-level security, encryption, and privacy controls.

ai.title: AI Enabled
ai.description: AI enabled assistant that guides you through your application and answers all of your questions.

cta_section.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta_section.subtitle: Join thousands of people who have successfully applied for benefits through our secure, user-friendly platform. Your journey to accessing benefits starts here.

prescreening.title: Eligibility Questionnaire
prescreening.subtitle: Answer a few quick questions to see if you may qualify for benefits

income.text: Is your household's monthly income less than $2,500?
income.help: Include all income from jobs, benefits, and other sources for everyone in your household.

assets.text: Do you have less than $2,000 in savings and assets?
assets.help: Include bank accounts, investments, and valuable items (excluding your home and one car).

citizenship.text: Are you a U.S. citizen or qualified non-citizen?
citizenship.help: Qualified non-citizens include permanent residents and certain other immigration statuses.

age_disability.text: Are you 65 or older, pregnant, or have a disability?
age_disability.help: This helps determine eligibility for certain Medicaid programs.

household_size.text: Do you have 4 or fewer people in your household?
household_size.help: Count yourself, your spouse (if married), and any dependents you claim on taxes.

work_requirements.text: Are you working at least 20 hours per week, or do you qualify for an exemption?
work_requirements.help: Exemptions include being under 18, over 50, pregnant, disabled, or caring for young children.

choice.title: Your Applications
choice.subtitle: Choose how you'd like to proceed with your benefits application
choice.error: Failed to load applications. Please try again.

start_new.title: Start New Application
start_new.description: Begin a fresh benefits application from the beginning

continue.title: Continue Existing
continue.description: Resume working on applications you've already started

benefit_selection.title: What benefits are you applying for?
benefit_selection.subtitle: Select the type of assistance you need. You can apply for one or both programs.

medicaid.title: Medicaid Only
medicaid.description: Health insurance coverage for eligible individuals and families
medicaid.details: Covers medical expenses including doctor visits, hospital stays, prescriptions, and preventive care

snap.title: SNAP Only
snap.details: Monthly benefits to help purchase nutritious food for you and your family

both.title: Both Medicaid and SNAP
both.description: Apply for both health insurance and food assistance
both.details: Get comprehensive support with both healthcare coverage and nutrition assistance

info.title: Important Information
points: You can apply for both programs in a single application
Each program has different eligibility requirements
Applying for both may increase your chances of receiving assistance

already_submitted.title: Application Status
already_submitted.subtitle: You have already submitted applications for all available benefits.
already_submitted.pending_review: Your applications are currently pending review by the state
already_submitted.description: You have submitted applications for Medicaid and SNAP benefits that are currently being reviewed by state officials. You will be notified of the status of your applications via email and mail.

what_next.title: What happens next?
points: State officials will review your applications within 30 days
You may be contacted for additional documentation
Check your account regularly for updates on application status
You will receive notification of approval or denial by mail and email

state_selection.title: Select Your State
state_selection.subtitle: Choose the state where you reside and are applying for benefits. Each state has different requirements and processes.
state_selection.label: State of Residence

household.title: Household Members
household.subtitle: Add any additional people who live with you and should be included in your application. You can skip this step if you live alone.
household.no_members: No additional household members added yet

form.title: Add Household Member
form.description: Enter information for the new household member

info.title: Who should I include?
info.description: Include anyone who lives with you regularly, shares meals, or contributes to household expenses. This includes spouses, children, parents, and other relatives or unrelated individuals living in your home.

applications.title: Your Applications
applications.description: View and manage all your benefit applications in one place.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Stay updated with important information about your applications and benefits.

report_changes.title: Report Changes
report_changes.description: Report important changes that may affect your benefits.

income.title: Income & Assets
income.description: Report changes in employment, income, or assets like bank accounts and property.

household.title: Household Changes
household.description: Report changes in household members, marriage, divorce, or family composition.

address.title: Address & Residency
address.description: Report address changes or moves to a different state or county.

insurance.title: Health Insurance
insurance.description: Report changes in health insurance coverage, Medicare eligibility, or job-based insurance.

form.change_type: What type of change are you reporting?
form.details: Please provide additional details about this change
form.details_placeholder: Describe the change and any relevant information...

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Upload and manage documents for your benefit applications.

upload.title: Upload New Document
upload.accepted_formats: Accepted formats: PDF, JPG, PNG, DOC, DOCX (Max 10MB)
upload.success_description: Your document has been received and will be processed shortly.

proof-of-income.label: Proof of Income
proof-of-income.description: Pay stubs, bank statements, or unemployment benefits statements.

proof-of-address.label: Proof of Address
proof-of-address.description: Utility bills, lease agreements, or official mail.

identification.label: Identification
identification.description: Driver's license, passport, or state ID.

medical-records.label: Medical Records
medical-records.description: Documents related to medical conditions or treatments.

profile.title: Profile Information
profile.description: Manage your account information and preferences.

communication.title: Communication Preferences
communication.description: Choose how you'd like to receive important updates and notifications.

language.title: Language Preferences
language.description: Select your preferred language for documents and communications.

signin.title: Welcome back
signin.subtitle: Sign in to your account
signin.signup_link: Don't have an account? Sign up
signin.timeout_message: Your session expired due to inactivity for security reasons. Please sign in again.
signin.security_notice: Security Notice: Automatic logout helps protect your personal health information in compliance with HIPAA regulations.

signup.title: Create your account
signup.signin_link: Already have an account? Sign in
signup.success_message: Account created successfully! Please check your email to confirm your account.

password_requirements.special: Contains at least one special character (!@#$%^&*(),.?":{}|<>)
